SEARCH
Package com.icx.common

Class Prop

java.lang.Object
com.icx.common.Prop
public abstract class Prop extends Object
Enhanced property management supporting properties for different runtime environments.

Provides general property helpers and methods supporting environment specific properties - which means multiple properties with same name but with different values for different runtime environments. To mark a property as environment specific environment path (like 'local/oracle' or 'customer1/prod') must precede property name separated by '/'. For Servlet based web applications current environment path can be defined in web.xml context parameter environment.

    • readProperties

      public static Properties readProperties(File propertiesFile) throws IOException
      Read properties from properties file.
      Parameters:
      propertiesFile - properties File object
      Returns:
      Properties object (empty if file is null)
      Throws:
      IOException - if if properties file is does not exist or is not accessible

    • readEnvironmentSpecificProperties

      public static Properties readEnvironmentSpecificProperties(File propertiesFile, String environmentPath, List<String> mandatoryPropertyNames) throws IOException
      Read properties which best match given environment.

      Selects properties which match most of the given environment path parts in their given order.

      Parameters:
      propertiesFile - properties File
      environmentPath - environment path (e.g. from context parameter environment of web.xml) - used to select properties for given runtime environment
      mandatoryPropertyNames - IN: null or names of properties which should exist - missing one or more leads to warning message, OUT: names of properties missed
      Returns:
      best matching properties or empty properties object if file is null
      Throws:
      IOException - if if properties file is does not exist or is not accessible

    • findPropertiesFile

      public static File findPropertiesFile(String name) throws IOException
      Find one-and-only properties file in class path
      Parameters:
      name - properties file name
      Returns:
      properties file found or null if no or multiple files were found in class path
      Throws:
      IOException - on IO error

      Returns:

    • getProperty

      public static Object getProperty(Properties properties, Class<?> type, String propertyName, Object defaultValue)
      Get context qualified property of given type.

      If property name is extended by context information his method recursively tries to find property value for configured property with all, some or at last non of the context infos (e.g. if given property name is 'text.de' and property 'text.de' exists the value of this property is returned. If only property 'text' exists the value of this - non-qualified - property is returned).

      Parameters:
      properties - Properties object
      type - type into which property value found shall be converted
      propertyName - name of property - may contain dot-separated context information (<base-property-name>[.<context-info>]*)
      defaultValue - value returned if property is not configured
      Returns:
      object of given type parsed from property string value

    • getStringProperty

      public static String getStringProperty(Properties properties, String propertyName, String defaultValue)

      defaultValue - value returned if property is not configured
